definitions: a person who advocates or supports a system of government in which several states unite under a central authority

examples.text: the ideas of the European federalists

shortDefinitions: person who advocates or supports system of government in which several states unite under central authority

definitions: a member or supporter of the Federalist Party

examples.text: they captured both the legislative and the executive branches of the federal government from the Federalists

shortDefinitions: member or supporter of Federalist Party

definitions: relating to or denoting a system of government in which several states unite under a central authority

examples.text: the federalist structure of the American system of government

shortDefinitions: relating to or denoting system of government in which several states unite under central authority

definitions: designating or pertaining to the Federalist Party

examples.text: it was not a weapon that could reach the Federalist judges

shortDefinitions: denoting or pertaining to Federalist Party
